item.description:
Cheryl Lemos

Subject: CANDIDATES SEEKING TO FORCE REPUBLICAN US SENATE PRIMARY TO ATTEND STRATFORD TEA PARTY RALLY
Ethan Book, Republican candidate for US Senate, will be attending the weekly Stratford Tea Party Rally on the corner of Main Street and Barnum Avenue in Stratford, CT on Thursday May 27, 2010 between 4:30 PM and 6:30 PM.

A representative for Peter Schiff will be in attendance as well.

They will be collecting signatures on petitions to force a Republican primary for the Connecticut US Senate seat against Linda McMahon.

The Stratford Star may also be covering this rally so the more the merrier!

Spread the word and come if you can and when you can!

Thanks so much.

Cheryl Lemos
Coordinator, Stratford Tea Party
item.name: Sign Schiff Petition at Stratford Tea Party!
